description: This file declares the interface IPluginStarter for starting Thunder plugins, including a pure virtual method 'activatePlugin' which handles activation with retries.

classes.name: IPluginStarter
classes.description: An interface for starting Thunder plugins, with a method to activate a plugin with specified retries and delay.

methods.name: activatePlugin
methods.description: Activates a Thunder plugin with retries and delay, returning true if successful within the retry limit.
